name: AfterWorld
description:
Join the realm of Afterworld.

Help the spirits of the Afterworld, and get rewards for completing quests.

Combat other inflicted spirits that are causing destruction and mayhem all over Afterworld.

Save hidden animals and let them join your team, each with with their own unique skills and mystics.

Equip different weapons which each change the fighting style of your character.

The game was made on RPG maker and uses it's combat system, but with some differences from your average "Take-Turn" combat.

Play this short game to find animals, protects others, save the Afterworld, but most importantly, have fun.
